name: Jelly Quest (Vũ Phan)
description:
Take this beautiful banner into game...

Help Pinka, Bluena and Cycaya, three cute Jellyfish answer funny riddles...


Gameplay Instructions:

● Select desire character and difficulty. Then press play button

● Press play button again to change riddle

● Control character to move around and grab bubble with letter above the sky, and drop into sea below. To fill answer on the right, below riddle question.
